summary: A chorus girl with marital woes is pursued by a gangster.
cast: Norma Talmadge|Gilbert Roland|John Wray|Lilyan Tashman|Mary Doran|Roscoe Karns|Allan Cavan|Stanley Fields|Kit Guard|Jean Harlow|DeWitt Jennings|Al Jolson|Tetsu Komai|Carl M. Leviness|Tom London|Al Norman|Landers Stevens|Charles Sullivan
title: Noches de Nueva York
